name: TaraStarDemo
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: tara star demo
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Upgrade your fluency in English with Tara! Try a free demo of the 'Tara Class English Star’ course.
 
In this skill, Tara will teach learners simple sentences that can be used to introduce one's friends in an impactful and elegant manner. This skill is mapped to the A1 level of CEFR (Common European Framework of Reference for Languages) and is intended for beginner learners of English who can understand the meaning of basic words in English and read simple sentences.

NO PERSONAL INFORMATION IS ACCEPTED/STORED BY THE SKILL.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
